title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, wrapping its REST API with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for browsers & Node.js, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration enabling Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI for Ollama with interactive prompts, conversation history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, monitoring, and optional GPU.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that calls local Ollama models for note summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to integrate Ollama LLMs into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store for Q&A.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, multimodal, and advanced API usage.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated list of community-modified GGUF models optimized for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel-based LLM queries.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Minecraft Fabric mod adding NPCs powered by local Ollama models for in-game chat.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama with session memory & tokens/sec metrics.

title: ollama-grafana
summary: Grafana dashboard and Prometheus exporter for monitoring Ollama server metrics.
